The class you should be using is `border-b-2`. This will give your element a 2px bottom border. You could adjust the value as needed: `-0` to `-8` (inclusive). Remember, these classes can also be combined with other border utilities if needed such as `border-l`, `border-t`, etc. If you want an actual separation space between the borders and content, you may need to use margin-bottom utility class.
